menu-help-tooltip: Contact the support team to solve doubts / problems
menu-exit-tooltip: Close session and exit the application
data-load-error-dialog-message:
An error {{status}} occurred while loading data. The error detail is as follows:

{{message}}

Please try again later.
data-save-error-dialog-message:
Failed to save data correctly. The error detail is as follows:

{{message}}

Please review all the data carefully and try again later.
data-save-success-dialog-message: All data have been saved successfully
delete-confirmation-dialog-message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected item? This operation CANNOT be undone.
no-element-selected-dialog-message: You must select an item from the list
access-code-error-dialog-message: The access code {{code}} is not valid
access-survey-error-dialog-message: Attention: there is currently no active survey, so you can not access the questionnaires. Please try again when the next survey has started. Thank you.
school-code-exists-dialog-message: Attention: There is already a registered school with the specified code. Please review this code and, if the problem persists, contact our support address: campus_contraelbullying@fcbarcelona.cat.
login-create-account: Please, register now as a school
login-error-400: Access denied: Invalid credentials.</br></br>Please check your email and password, and try again.
password-restore-dialog-title:
Password recovery

Enter the e-mail address associated to your registered user. A new access code will be generated and sent to your e-mail address.
password-restore-dialog-error-message: The new password could not be reset. Please verify that the specified email address is correct and is registered in the system.
password-restore-dialog-success-message: The new password has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox and access the system with the new password provided. Next, set a new password of your choice through the Access Data option.
dashboard-card-survey-progress: Status of active survey ({{remainingDays}} days left)
dashboard-option-surveys-description: Schedule new surveys, view and / or modify existing surveys
dashboard-option-schools-description: View a list of registered schools, register new schools and / or modify their data
dashboard-option-results-description: View and analyze the answers obtained from the questionnaires, export data into CSV files
dashboard-option-access-urls-title: Access the questionnaires for each course
dashboard-option-access-urls-description: View the questionnaires URLs to be passed for each course
dashboard-option-user-profile-descriptio: View and / or modify my data and access password
dashboard-option-school-profile-descript: View and / or modify the school data and access password
dashboard-option-protocol-pdf-descriptio: View the application protocol document in PDF format
dashboard-option-generate-report-descrip: View the results reports for completed surveys in PDF format
dashboard-option-contact-description: Contact us if you need to answer any questions about the application
school-section-info-content: Please, review and complete the profile data of the school.
school-section-accept-cond: I accept the terms of use
school-section-signup-ok:
Dear {{name}} {{surname}},

We have correctly received all the information from your school, so from this moment you are registered in our program.

Thank you very much for your participation.
student-survey-section-success:
Dear student,

We have correctly received all the answers in this questionnaire. Thank you very much for participating in the anti-bullying program of the Barça Foundation.

Best regards.
profile-section-user-instructions: Fill in your personal information and / or modify your password.
profile-section-school-instructions: Complete and / or modify the desired data. Please note that the e-mail and the school code cannot be altered.
survey-crud-create-instructions: Complete each field of the new survey. Please note that survey periods cannot overlap.
survey-crud-edit-instructions: Modify the desired survey data without overlapping with existing surveys.
school-crud-create-instructions: Complete each of the data of the new school. Note that optional questionnaires are randomly assigned.
school-crud-edit-instructions: Modify the desired data of the school. Importantly, the coordinator's email cannot be altered
contact-section-card-instructions: Please explain your question or problem clearly and concisely. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact-section-success-dialog-message:
Your support request has been successfully sent. We will review your problem in depth and respond to the email address provided as soon as possible.

Thank you for contacting us.
contact-section-error-dialog-message:
No se ha podido enviar correctamente su solicitud de soporte. El detalle del error es el siguiente:

{{message}}

Por favor, vuelva a intentarlo más tarde.
contact-email-body-intro: A support request was received from a user enrolled in the program. The content of this request is as follows:
validation-question-required: You must answer this question to continue
validation-multioption-required: You must select at least one option
validation-accept-cond-required: You must accept the terms of use
validation-survey-date-conflict: Start date or end date conflicting with another existing survey
validation-survey-dates-conflict: The survey end date must be after the start date
validation-survey-ordinal-conflict: Provided ordinal already exists for the course
validation-assigned-questionnaires-requi: You must select at least 2 optional questionnaires
validation-assigned-questionnaires-confl: The grades for the assigned questionnaires cannot overlap
validation-school-code-not-allowed: School code not registered in the program
